metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22452 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: SQL Injection vulnerability in function getTableCreationQuery inCreateAddField.php in phpMyAdmin 5.x before 5.2.0 via thetbl_storage_engine or tbl_collation parameters to tbl_create.php.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
